entry.title: Poke and P(rod)
entry.summary:
Author: TastyTaboo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,629Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: “What’s this?” He asks, idly flicking the latch open. He expects some sort of vibrator or maybe a lengthy plug, but he doesn’t get either. Within the case lay several metal rods, some thinner with a little bud at the bottom, some completely smooth but different thicknesses, and some that are ridged in different patterns all the way down. His brows furrow. “Is this some sort of kitchen utensil?”Richard snorts. “They’re sounding rods.”DamiDick Summer Week 8: Sounding
